response.job_title: Master of Business and Information Technology -Solution Architect - Business Intelligence Professor
response.summary: Electronics Engineer, Master of Business Information Technology, with 10 years of experience in the technology industry, teamwork oriented, fast learner, possesses strong analytical, strategic and communicative abilities to obtain results. Currently interested in researching and developing of business and IT alignment models. Knowledge of technology infrastructure on-premises and cloud, hardware and software solutions at enterprise and consumer level, business and IT architecture, frameworks and methodologies for digital transformation. Also experienced in pre-sales and consultative sales for business progression and positioning of technology products in the Latin-American market.
response.skills: Data Warehousing, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence (BI), Tecnología de la información, Gestión de ventas, Ingeniería, Docencia, Presentaciones, Proceso de ventas, Investigación, Transformación digital, Análisis de datos, Inteligencia empresarial, Cloud Computing, Storage, Pre-sales, Solution Selling, Business Analysis, Capacidad analítica, Telecommunications

profile_positions.description: Responsable del proceso de pre-venta y arquitectura de soluciones de infraestructura tecnológica híbridas (on-premises y cloud) en la región de Latinoamérica.
profile_positions.title: Principal Sales Consultant - Hybrid Cloud Systems

profile_positions.description:
Responsible of pre-sales for the latin america region in the converged systems unit, performing activities as :
•	Design integrated technological solutions (On-Premises and Cloud) according to the client needs.
•	Support the sales team from a technical and business consulting approach
•	Analyze competence environments highlighting technical and economic advantages of solutions.
•	Present the technical proposals to clients.
profile_positions.title: Cloud Systems Sales Consultant - Latin America

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for:
•	Training and accompanying business partners in the process of identifying sales opportunities
•	Training business partners in the region about complete portfolio of hardware solutions
•	Conduct competitive analysis of Oracle hardware solutions at different business situations in the market.
•	Participate in the development of sales growth strategies through business partners for hardware unit.
profile_positions.title: Hardware Product Specialist for Business Partners Development Latin America.

profile_positions.description: Collaborating partner in: business design, financial analysis, inventory management, selection, implementation and maintenance of technological tools such as: email, Open Source Dolibarr ERP, POS system TakePOS.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Adjunct Professor - Department of Systems Engineering
Subject: Business Intelligence - Data Warehouse
Continous education professor - Diploma in Business Intelligence, datawarehouse design.
profile_positions.title: Adjunct professor - Continuous education professor

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for:
•	Providing pre-sales technical support of Storage Solutions for the region.
•	Present advantages and key features of Storage solutions to clients and business partners in person and remotely.
•	Performing competitive analysis, highlighting the advantages of the solutions in IBM’s Storage portfolio in order to advance the Business for regions of Spanish South America & Mexico through the business partners.
profile_positions.title: Field Technical Sales Specialist Spanish South America

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for progression and closing of business for the brands System X, Power Systems & Storage Systems, through IBM Business Partners in Venezuela performing:
•	Accompaniment to business partners of IBM Venezuela in recognizing customer needs.
•	Configurations of right solutions with the business partner.
•	Quotes of solutions and negotiation of prices, focused on an effective close of the deals.
profile_positions.title: Hardware Sales Specialist  Small Deals for Venezuela.

profile_positions.description:
Supported the IBM Systems & Technology Group (STG) Small Deals Spanish South America (SSA) Team in business process activities such as:
•	Performing configurations of System X solutions (x86 servers), Storage systems and Power architecture servers (RISC servers).
•	Presentation and support of technical proposals for customers in person and remotely.
•	Solving customer queries about these proposals in order to expedite the closing of the business.
•	Prepare quotations of the solutions to be presented to the client.
profile_positions.title: Intern STG Small Deals for SSA

company.name: Oracle
company.description:
We’re a cloud technology company that provides organizations around the world with computing infrastructure and software to help them innovate, unlock efficiencies and become more effective. We also created the world’s first – and only – autonomous database to help organize and secure our customers’ data.
 
Oracle Cloud Infrastructure offers higher performance, security, and cost savings. It is designed so businesses can move workloads easily from on-premises systems to the cloud, and between cloud and on-premises and other clouds. Oracle Cloud applications provide business leaders with modern applications that help them innovate, attain sustainable growth, and become more resilient. 
 
The work we do is not only transforming the world of business--it's helping defend governments, and advance scientific and medical research. From nonprofits to companies of all sizes, millions of people use our tools to streamline supply chains, make HR more human, quickly pivot to a new financial plan, and connect data and people around the world.  

At work, we embrace diversity, encourage personal and professional growth, and celebrate a global team of passionate people developing innovative technologies that help people and companies tackle real-world problems head-on.

If you’d like to join us, please visit our Careers page: https://www.oracle.com/corporate/careers/

For investor news, SEC filings, and financial information about Oracle (NYSE:ORCL), please visit https://investor.oracle.com/home/.
 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/oracle 
Like our page on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Oracle/ 
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oracle/
